name: Bratz - Rock Angelz [GBA]
description:
Bratz: Rock Angelz is an adventure-strategy game developed by Blitz Games and AWE Productions. It came out on 04-10-2005. THQ published the game. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Bratz: Rock Angelz on Game Boy Advance, GameCube, PlayStation 2 and PC.
